tool_description: Download mp4 and mp3 from youtube
title: YTConvert

api_list.name: /url/generate
api_list.description: Gets a url or key to download or stream MP4 or MP3

api_list.name: /search
api_list.description: Search by content, URL or playlist

api_list.name: /download/mp4
api_list.description: Download using the key as param generated in the request "/url/generate"

api_list.name: /download/mp3
api_list.description: Download using the key as param generated in the request "/url/generate"

api_list.name: /stream/mp3
api_list.description: Get stream mp3 using the key as param generated in the request "/url/generate"

api_list.name: /stream/mp4
api_list.description: Get stream mp4 using the key as param generated in the request "/url/generate"
